trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around November 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was checking on a trash fire we had started at midnight to make sure it wasnt getting out of control before going to bed. As i pulled up in the pickup me and my brother in law saw it in the distance. North of the new Central Valley Ag near Royal ne. What looked to be a large triangle of light on its side like a sail. Emitting a massive amount of light white and yellow in color and it was very large. Estimated about 1000 AGL Estimated about 1000 foot wide Estimated about 3-4ish miles away. Originally suspected it was combine lights however it was soon realized it was off the surface .. it was far away and it was massive.. the light started to dim. then red and orange orbs showed up on the bottom on a line maybe 4-5 of them.. then they flickered and dimed to nothing from the first sight until it was completely gone was about 2-3 min
Summary: Bright Triangle emitting yellow and white light fading to red orbs
